content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-83.5) and resources of coal.

### Iron Plate Factory at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) with a furnace source of iron ore and a furnace result of iron plates.

### Inserter System at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) with a pickup position at (x=44.5, y=-80.5) and a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-80.5), connected to multiple Wooden Chests at positions (x=44.5, y=-81.5), (x=45.5, y=-80.5), and (x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace.
### Errors when output is blocked by items on the ground
- Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output from the Burner Mining Drill.
### Errors when using insert_item function
- Make sure to check the inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into an entity.
